Description
Feel like Rufus from Street Fighter IV with this alternate suit top! Goes great with the alternate suit bottom! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Rufus de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de costume alternatif ! Essayez-le avec le bas correspondant ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesem oberen Teil eines alternativen Bodysuits wie Rufus aus Street Fighter IV! Passt hervorragend zum unteren Teil! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Rufus di Street Fighter IV con la parte sopra di questo costume alternativo! Va alla grande con la parte sotto! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este traje alternativo (p. superior) y siéntete como Rufus de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combina a la perfección con la parte inferior! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ルーファスになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のスーツ （上） 上下合わせて着たいスーツ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 루퍼스가 되는 어렌지 ver. 슈트(상의). 상, 하의를 맞춰서 입고 싶은 슈트. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Rufus from Street Fighter IV with this alternate suit top! Goes great with the alternate suit bottom! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Rufus的服裝 (上)之特別版。會令人想要上下合起來穿。 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
